originalText.text:
Bill at Flower Fashion is a master and a spectacular human being! His love and light shines through in both his arrangements and his dedication to his customers. I will only say two things more.
1. ‚ÄúThe Best!‚Äù
2. My heart is happy. üíóüíêüåπ

originalText.text: This place is the real deal. Bill the owner does something I've never seen before...he talks to you! He finds out all about the occasion and the person and gives unbelievable suggestions and advice. The flowers and arrangements are all beautiful and the prices are great because you're working directly with him instead of an internet company that's marking things up and then just going to them anyway. You have to use this place!!

text.text: This place is the real deal. Bill the owner does something I've never seen before...he talks to you! He finds out all about the occasion and the person and gives unbelievable suggestions and advice. The flowers and arrangements are all beautiful and the prices are great because you're working directly with him instead of an internet company that's marking things up and then just going to them anyway. You have to use this place!!

originalText.text:
There are absolutely not enough words in the English language for me to express the level of gratitude I have for Bill. This beautiful human being is something else. I first found Bill online and read the reviews about him - not about the shop (although his work is beautiful) but more about him. As someone who just spoke with him, these reviews ring ever so true.

This incredibly kind, deeply thoughtful, and lovingly intentional florist went ABOVE and BEYOND any florist I have ever worked with. I am a lover of flowers, I have supported local florists for nearly two decades in New Jersey, Boston, and DC. Bill is not your average florist. He is an architect of flowers. He is this compelling conductor and curator of light, joy, and passion. He doesn't only take the time to listen to what you are looking for but he offers this wild range of flowers that I have never heard of or seen before. He sits with you and listens to why you are buying the flowers and orchestrates flowers to honor your loved one and the occasion. As if that wasn't enough, this lovely soul helped me to co-write the message that goes on the card. The fact that he knew exactly what I wanted to say and how was undoubtedly the sweetest thing ANY florist I have ever worked with has ever done. He was deeply attentive. He was beyond kind. Also, the price range fit my budget. His flower selection is international and it's the most beautiful buffet of options available. His work is magic because HE is magic. He is intentional and purposeful and THAT is who you want arranging flowers for your loved ones.

He gave me his time, his energy, his words, his light. I do *not* often write reviews, but Bill and his future customers need to know the level of care and warmth that he provides - it is in complete abundance. Call up Flower Fashion, and you probably won't need to ask for Bill because you will recognize him by his cheerful voice. Order from Bill and I promise you, you will n o t be disappointed.

originalText.text: Bill, the owner of flower fashion, was very helpful.  Fast delivery. It was a great experience ordering flowers for my daughters birthday the flower arrangement was beautiful, she loved it. I am so happy with flower fashion I will be ordering from them again. Thank you, Billüåπ
